text: Mihai Marian Aioani (born 7 November 1999) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Chindia Târgoviște.REGULA U21 / Emanuel Dat, debutant la 15 ani, 7 luni şi 16 zile [U21 Rule / Emanuel Dat, make his debut at 15 years, 7 months and 16 days]. frf.ro Aioani made his Liga I debut on 15 July 2019, for Chindia Târgoviște, in a 2–2 draw against Gaz Metan Mediaș.Ne-au gazat, dar am supraviețuit! Chindia rămâne în picioare după duelul debutului de la Mediaș [They gassed us, but we survived!
